* Mimics the standard shuffling technique
 * @param {[String]} deck Deck to push the cards into

leadingComments.value: Take a hand of a random amount of cards from the bottom of the deck

trailingComments.value: Take a random amount of cards from the bottom the hand

leadingComments.value: Take a random amount of cards from the bottom the hand

trailingComments.value: Put what remains of the hand at the top of the deck

leadingComments.value: Put what remains of the hand at the top of the deck

trailingComments.value: Put the other hand on top

leadingComments.value: Put the other hand on top

* Mimics the standard shuffling technique
 * @param {[String]} deck Deck to push the cards into

trailingComments.value:
* Pushes a quantity of cards into another
 * @param {[String]} cards The source of the cards to push
 * @param {Number} quantity How many cards to take from each half
 * @param {[String]} deck Deck to push the cards into

leadingComments.value:
* Pushes a quantity of cards into another
 * @param {[String]} cards The source of the cards to push
 * @param {Number} quantity How many cards to take from each half
 * @param {[String]} deck Deck to push the cards into

trailingComments.value:
* Splits the deck in two, then merges the two halfs
 * to form a new deck
 * @param {[String]} deck The cards to split

leadingComments.value:
* Splits the deck in two, then merges the two halfs
 * to form a new deck
 * @param {[String]} deck The cards to split

comments.value:
* Mimics the standard shuffling technique
 * @param {[String]} deck Deck to push the cards into
Take a hand of a random amount of cards from the bottom of the deck
Take a random amount of cards from the bottom the hand
Put what remains of the hand at the top of the deck
Put the other hand on top
